# readCamera(configuration:)

**Type Method**

Reads an async sequence of video frames captured with a video camera.

## Declaration

```swift
static func readCamera(configuration: VideoReader.CameraConfiguration) async throws -> VideoReader.CameraAsyncBuffers
```

## Parameters

- **configuration**: The camera configuration

## Return Value

An async sequence of camera video frames.

## Reading

- **read(_:)**: Reads a sequence of annotated files as an array of annotated async sequences of video frames.
- **read(contentsOf:)**: Reads a video file as an async sequence of video frames.
- **VideoReader.AsyncFrames**: An async sequence of video frames.
- **VideoReader.CameraAsyncBuffers**: An async sequence of video frames.
- **VideoReader.CameraConfiguration**: The configuration of the camera to pass to the `readCamera` method.
